name: Square thing and the legend of Circle ones (Prototype)
name_original: Square thing and the legend of Circle ones (Prototype)
description:
Play as Square thing, A little cube that harnesses the power of the circle pads and uses them to move gracefully and quickly. Make your way and collect all the coins throughout the stage. Can you master the powers of the circle pads or will the pads control you?

-You make your way
-Minimalist color design
-Simple control
-Fast paced or slow depending on your gameplay

Credits:
-BG Music by cynicmusic: https://opengameart.org/content/crystal-cave-song18
